relics.name: Antique Wedding Ring
relics.description: A simple gold band with an inscription inside: 'Forever, 1985'

butterflyConsequence.newTimeline: She never experiences the fire because she's still with her husband

relics.name: Red Cat Collar
relics.description: A faded red collar with a small bell. The tag reads 'Luna'

butterflyConsequence.newDialogue: I'm so glad I got home early that day. Luna was waiting by the door as always.

relics.name: Concert Ticket Stub
relics.description: June 15, 2024. The Night Everything Changed. General Admission.

newNpc.name: Unknown Woman
newNpc.dialogue: I don't know why I'm here. I was supposed to be somewhere else tonight.
newNpc.problem: Lost. Confused. Looking for someone she can't remember.

relics.name: Pocket Watch
relics.description: An old pocket watch. The hands stopped at 11:47 PM.

butterflyConsequence.newTimeline: His father lived. Mr. Chen was never born.

relics.name: Old Photograph
relics.description: A sepia photograph of a young girl in front of this shop. The shop wasn't built until 1995.

butterflyConsequence.newTimeline: She never moved away. She's still in town, living a different life.

relics.name: Vintage Saxophone
relics.description: A gleaming brass saxophone. Someone engraved 'For M.W. - You were always meant to play'

newNpc.name: Marcus Webb
newNpc.dialogue: I remember playing at the Blue Note. But someone else is in my memories now. Someone who never picked up the horn.
newNpc.problem: He found the saxophone but never learned to play. His life took a different path.

relics.name: Medical Emergency File
relics.description: A man's file. Name: David Chen. DOB: 1960. Cause of death: Cardiac arrest, 11:45 PM, 1994.

butterflyConsequence.newDialogue: I saved him that night. The file arrived just in time. His wife... she still writes to me every year.

relics.name: Unsent Letter
relics.description: A yellowed letter addressed to 'My Dearest' but never sealed.

butterflyConsequence.newDialogue: I gave her the letter. She never made that drive. She's still alive.
